name: chordmunchr
description:
mess around with the keys and make a lil' beat! Controls:
  • Press A, S, D, F, Q, W, E, R to play the chords
  • Press J, K, L, ;, U, I, O, P to make the blob play the tunes
  • Press SPACEBAR to play the beat

sometimes the input might not get registered, if this happens, try to click on the game or reload the page a couple times. if it still happens, let me know!

planning to add more features and fixing a couple of bugs in the future, but until then, have fun!

inspired by louie zong's dream piano
